name: Spider-Drone
description:
The Official Movie Edition Streaming Video Spider-Drone looks great in the package, but you can't wait to get it in the air to stream & capture live video to your iOS device. Besides streaming video from your Spider-Drone, the Spider-Drone App hosts a flight manual, achievement checklist and media gallery to start your web adventures and calm your spider sense.

Record HD video straight to your device or a micro SD card.

Unlock achievements as your flight skills progress.

Access your complete flight activity log at any time.
